article_title: Driver shot to death, sleeping passenger heard nothing, Lakeland police say
article_text:
LAKELAND — A sleeping passenger in a pickup truck claims he had no idea that the driver had been fatally shot, Lakeland police say.

Police were called Sunday morning to the Kimberlea Apartments, 2025 Sylvester Road, by a person who believed two people had been shot in a car parked outside the clubhouse. Inside, driver Tyler Robert McQueen, 22, had been fatally shot and Brandon Burkett, a passenger, was sleeping.

Burkett was unaware of the shooting and is cooperating with detectives, police said.

The pickup, a 2011 Chevrolet Silverado, was registered to McQueen, of Lakeland.

Authorities are interviewing the passenger and witnesses. No other details were released.
